indexRoute.descriptionText: An enhanced version of the already amazing Chatpad!

1.title: Free and open source
1.description: This app is provided for free and the source code is available on GitHub.

2.title: Privacy focused
2.description: No tracking, no cookies, no bullshit. All your data is stored locally.

3.title: Best experience
3.description: Crafted with love and care to provide the best experience possible.

chatRoute.tldr: tl;dr of the following text, max 4 words

chatIdError.title: Error
chatIdError.message: ChatId is not defined. Please create a chat to get started.

apiKeyError.title: Error
apiKeyError.message: OpenAI API Key is not defined. Please set your API Key.

importError.title: Error
importError.message: The file you selected is invalid.

deleteAllDataModal.title: Delete All Data
deleteAllDataModal.text: Are you sure you want to delete your data?

deleteChatModal.title: Delete Chat
deleteChatModal.text: Are you sure you want to delete this chat?

deleteMessageModal.title: Delete Message
deleteMessageModal.text: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

settingsModal.title: Settings
settingsModal.apiKeyText2: The API Key is stored locally on your browser and never sent anywhere else.
settingsModal.warningMessage: The displayed cost was not updated yet to reflect the costs for each model. Right now it will always show the cost for GPT-3.5 on OpenAI.

apiKeySaved.title: Saved
apiKeySaved.message: Your OpenAI Key has been saved.

apiTypeSaved.title: Saved
apiTypeSaved.message: Your OpenAI Type has been saved.

apiModelSaved.title: Saved
apiModelSaved.message: Your OpenAI Model has been saved.

apiBaseSaved.title: Saved
apiBaseSaved.message: Your OpenAI Base has been saved.

apiVersionSaved.title: Saved
apiVersionSaved.message: Your OpenAI Version has been saved.

deletePromptModal.title: Delete Prompt
deletePromptModal.text: Are you sure you want to delete this prompt?
deletePromptModal.label: Delete Prompt

error.title: Error
error.message: Can't remove chat. Please refresh the page and try again.

deleteChatsModal.title: Delete Chats
deleteChatsModal.text: Are you sure you want to delete your chats?
